station.name: Bloomberg Radio
station.desc: Unparalleled global news and information resources
station.longDesc: Bloomberg Radio is the world's only global 24-hour business radio station. Powered by more than 2700 journalists and analysts in more than 120 countries, Bloomberg Radio's resources are unparalleled. Because the financial markets never sleep, Bloomberg follows them around the globe.

station.name: CBS Radio News
station.desc: Unparalleled global news and information resources
station.longDesc: CBS Radio News is a dynamic and compelling radio news network featuring CBS News-on-the-Hour, the CBS World News Roundup, The Osgood File, The Dave Ross Show, Reporters Notebook, and much more.

station.name: NPR News
station.desc: This radio station offers programs of US national public radio network, including 'Morning Edition' and 'All Things Considered'.
station.longDesc: This radio station offers programs of US national public radio network, including 'Morning Edition' and 'All Things Considered'.

station.name: FOX News Talk
station.desc: The online radio for the successful US American news station FOX News. Talk shows, news and interviews in audio format.
station.longDesc: The online radio for the successful US American news station FOX News. Talk shows, news and interviews in audio format.

station.name: WINS - 1010 WINS CBS New York
station.desc: All News. All the Time. You give us 22 minutes, we'll give you the world.
station.longDesc: All News. All the Time. You give us 22 minutes, we'll give you the world.

station.name: Times Insider Live
station.desc: An insider look at The Times’s coverage of health and well-being.

station.name: WNYC 93.9 FM
station.desc: WNYC is one of New York's flagship public radio stations, broadcasting the finest programs from the region.
station.longDesc: WNYC is one of New York's flagship public radio stations, broadcasting the finest programs from the region.

station.name: WFAN 66 AM - 101.9 FM
station.desc: WFAN Radio: As the world’s first 24-hour all-sports radio station, WFAN remains the premier sports talk radio station in the business.
station.longDesc: WFAN Radio: As the world’s first 24-hour all-sports radio station, WFAN remains the premier sports talk radio station in the business.

station.name: ESPN Radio
station.desc: ESPN Radio: All the sport in one place.
station.longDesc: ESPN Radio: All the sport in one place.

station.name: WCBS 880
station.desc: WCBS Newsradio 880 is one of America’s most listened to radio stations providing news and information on the AM dial in New York for 45 years.
station.longDesc: WCBS Newsradio 880 is one of America’s most listened to radio stations providing news and information on the AM dial in New York for 45 years.

station.name: Voice of America Newscast
station.desc: Your source for news and information from around the world.
station.longDesc: Your source for news and information from around the world.

station.name: Underground 80s
station.desc: Early 80s UK Synthpop and a bit of New Wave.
station.longDesc: Centered around the UK Synthpop style of the early 80s with a bit of new wave splashed in, you'll hear music from Human League, Depeche Mode, Thompson Twins, A Flock of Seagulls, New Order and Ultravox, as well as lesser-known but critically acclaimed artists from the time such as New Musik, Comsat Angels, Lene Lovich, Fad Gadget and Robert Hazard.

station.name: Left Coast 70s
station.desc: Mellow album rock from the Seventies. Yacht not required.
station.longDesc: In the late 70s and very early 80s, when the mood was mellow, and the vibe was softer, many rock artists started creating slower, thoughtfully-produced tracks. Drawing lyrical influences from the folk singers before them, and bringing together some of the best session players of the day, these artists stepped outside their comfort zones to create some of the best mellow rock ever made, a sound that blossomed out of Los Angeles and spread up and down the west coast.
